3 Known problems

3.3 Foreign interface library update at next MLWorks release

The next release of MLWorks will significantly rework the foreign interface library (FI). The new FI supports a wider range of datatypes, is more efficient, and is easier to use.

After the next version of MLWorks is released, Harlequin will offer support if you need to upgrade existing FI code to work with the new FI.

MLWorks Release Notes version 2.0 - 28 Aug 1998
